issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The product is working as designed.
resolution.name: Not a Bug

fields.summary: Create a config property to validate supported eucalyptus properties in CFN

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

issuetype.description: A new feature of the product, which has yet to be developed.
issuetype.name: New Feature

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
On AWS, when a given resource contains the {{DependsOn}} resource attribute under {{Properties}} in a Cloudformation template (reference attached template):
{code}
...
        "EIP": {
            "Type" : "AWS::EC2::EIP",
                "Properties" : {
                    "DependsOn" : "AttachGateway",
                    "Domain": "vpc"
                }
        },
{code}
The stack deployed using the template will go into {{ROLLBACK_COMPLETE}} state.  The error seen in the stack events:
{code}
...
STACKEVENTS	EIP-CREATE_FAILED-2016-09-16T04:14:15.306Z	EIP			CREATE_FAILED	Encountered unsupported property DependsOn	AWS::EC2::EIP	arn:aws:cloudformation:us-west-2:017179026131:stack/DependsOnTest/05aa6b80-7bc4-11e6-af38-503f20f2adae	DependsOnTest	2016-09-16T04:14:15.306Z
...
{code}
The same template on Eucalyptus deploys successfully:
{code}
[root@g-12-12 ~]# euform-describe-stacks --region testrunner-admin@
STACK	EIPTest	CREATE_COMPLETE		Elastic IP Test - EIP association to instance in VPC using AWS::EC2::NetworkInterfaceAttachment resource	2016-09-15T22:38:40.753Z
PARAMETER	ImageId		emi-ee2e1cdf
PARAMETER	InstanceType		m1.medium
OUTPUT	InstanceId	i-b3700f85
OUTPUT	ElasticIP	10.116.132.245
OUTPUT	AllocationID	eipalloc-c6f114bf
OUTPUT	NetworkInterfaceId	eni-56a547dd
OUTPUT	NetworkInterfacePrivId	10.0.0.237
OUTPUT	SecondaryNetworkInterfaceId	eni-6a697cad
OUTPUT	SecondaryNetworkInterfacePrivId	10.0.0.149
OUTPUT	NetworkInterfaceAttachmentId	eni-attach-03959857

[root@g-12-12 ~]# euform-describe-stack-events EIPTest --region testrunner-admin@
EVENT	EIPTest	aff51620-44d7-48a8-9e9a-ff4b9d5011c1	AWS::CloudFormation::Stack	EIPTest	arn:aws:cloudformation::000651989085:stack/EIPTest/489a395e-0438-46a2-9925-fe9b342451f0	2016-09-15T22:41:22.156Z	CREATE_COMPLETE

fields.summary: "DependsOn" not flagged as unsupported Property in a given CFN Resource

comments.body: We don't reject unsupported properties at all, we just ignore them.  This is to maintain 'compatibility' with templates that AWS supports with more advanced features.
Behaves as designed. Though it would be nice to optionally or temporarily enable stricter checking.
